shortDescription: "Blocks following an if without else will not execute if the condition is false"
shortCorrection: "Blocks following an if without else will execute even if the condition is false"

If the condition in an `if-then` is false, the blocks following (not inside) the `if-then` will not execute.

frontmatter.shortDescription: Blocks following an if without else will not execute if the condition is false
frontmatter.shortCorrection: Blocks following an if without else will execute even if the condition is false
